Text: Hey guys. The creator of this game would really love it if you guys passed it along. So when you're done downloading, PLEASE SEED! And if you could, pass this along to your friends.

explain to me kindly .... On behalf of your good friend (and developer of this game...

explain why the game cost £10 or around $15..

and why your friends and devs uploade it free on piratebay

I checked out the site and the video ... and it looks like it could be a decent game if it ever gets finished, altho repetitive ... they need funding to get it completed so to give out this demo in as many venues to get the word out is a good way of acheiving it
